answers.author: Sam Anselm
answers.text:
You might want to contact the City of St. Charles, Missouri.  They have an arena that is run either by the City or by St. Charles County...
http://www.stcharlescitymo.gov/ContactUs/tabid/72/Default.aspx

author: Margie Rose
text:
I am looking for a RFP for Performance Audit that is associated with Arena and Convention Centers.  I would greatly appreciate a copy.  Thanks.
Margie C. Rose
Assistant City Manager
City of Corpus Christi, Texas
title: Assistant City Manager
